name: That Red Fluid
description:
We are at a new era, an era where robotic programming is over.
Indeed, studies have allowed scientists to give robots intelligence close to that of humans, but at the price of human blood.
The DNA contained in human blood mixed with other substances have allowed scientists to create what is called "Red Fluid", a liquid that gives life to robots. However, when robots lack Red Fluid, they change their character, become aggressive and begin to siphon Men from their blood. Thus, they put their research base in quarantine.
You too are a robot that works thanks to the Red Fluid, explore the base and find an exit.

NOTE:
This is just the first level of the game. Thanks to your feedbacks I could improve it and continue the development on a better basis. So do not hesitate to tell me what could be improved, something that bothers you, etc.

HOW TO PLAY:

  • MOVEMENT: ARROW Keys
  • JUMPING: SPACE Key
  • FLASHLIGHT TOGGLE ON/OFF: F Key
  • INTERACTION: E key
  • ATTACKING (MELE): V Key (You must be close to the enemy)
  • LASER GUN (IF EQUIPPED): 1 key
